reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 596/22: PRESCRIBED ACTS - SUBSECTIONS 21.1.1 (1.1) AND 21.1.2 (1.1) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: PRESCRIBED ACTS — SUBSECTIONS 21.1.1 (1.1) AND 21.1.2 (1.1) OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 596/22: PRESCRIBED ACTS - SUBSECTIONS 21.1.1 (1.1) AND 21.1.2 (1.1) OF THE ACT

content.content: 1. The following Acts are prescribed for the purposes of subsections 21.1.1 (1.1) and 21.1.2 (1.1) of the Act: 1. The Aggregate Resources Act. 2. The Condominium Act, 1998. 3. The Drainage Act. 4. The Endangered Species Act, 2007. 5. The Environmental Assessment Act. 6. The Environmental Protection Act. 7. The Niagara Escarpment Planning and Development Act. 8. The Ontario Heritage Act. 9. The Ontario Water Resources Act. 10. The Planning Act.
content.raw_html:
1. The following Acts are prescribed for the purposes of subsections 21.1.1 (1.1) and 21.1.2 (1.1) of the Act:

1. The Aggregate Resources Act.

2. The Condominium Act, 1998.

3. The Drainage Act.

4. The Endangered Species Act, 2007.

5. The Environmental Assessment Act.

6. The Environmental Protection Act.

7. The Niagara Escarpment Planning and Development Act.

8. The Ontario Heritage Act.

9. The Ontario Water Resources Act.

10. The Planning Act.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
